Description: Fragment of East Greek grey ware thick-walled pottery vessel; moulded decoration: couchant sphinx to right with frontal head; sickle wing.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Leiden University, Faculty of Archaeology. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: van de Wiel 1968 / Verzameling ceramiek en Terracotta's Archaeologisch Instituut der Rijksuniversiteit Leiden (p. 8, N 24, pl. 2, n 24)
Prins de Jong 1925 / Scherben aus Naukratis: Aus der Sammlung des Universitäts-Professors Dr Fr W Freih von Bissing (p. 55, no. 1, pl. III.3)
CVA Musée Scheurleer II (Hague) / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum Pays-Bas Musée Scheurleer (p. 6, no. 15, pl. 2)
